document.full_text: the s&p 500 met tough resistance on monday, failing to break a level that has held since mid-february and ending flat even as a spate of deals and underlying strength in the economy spurred optimism.
document.title: s&p closes flat, fails to break through resistance
lines_and_colors: the s&p 500 met tough resistance on monday, failing to break a level that has held since mid-february and ending flat even as a spate of deals and underlying strength in the economy spurred optimism.
